images.alt: drumstick chockolate fudge brownie king cones

text: The iconic DRUMSTICK experience is now available in a tub! Everything you love about DRUMSTICK Chocolate Fudge Brownie cones -- creamy vanilla and chocolate flavoured frozen dessert, a delicious chocolatey ripple, rich brownie pieces, and crunchy chocolatey-covered wafer pieces-- are now all mixed together in a scoopable, shareable treat, perfect for enjoying with friends and family. Proudly crafted in Ontario, Canada, DRUMSTICK Chocolate Fudge Brownie is made with Canadian dairy and has no artificial colours. Create some joyful memories with DRUMSTICK Chocolate Fudge Brownie frozen dessert and try our other DRUMSTICK tub flavours -- Vanilla Caramel and Strawberry Cheesecake. DRUMSTICK, the original sundae cone experience since 1928.
Now Available In A Tub: The iconic DRUMSTICK experience is now available in a tub, perfect for sharing with family and friends
Layers Of Fun: Creamy taste of chocolate and vanilla flavoured frozen dessert with a delicious chocolatey ripple, rich brownie pieces, and crunchy chocolatey-covered wafer pieces
From Canada With Love: DRUMSTICK Chocolate Fudge Brownie tubs are crafted in Canada and made with Canadian dairy
Just the Good Stuff: Prepared with no artificial colors
More DRUMSTICK Fun: Enjoy our DRUMSTICK cones!
Since 1928: The original sundae cone experience since 1928

Modified milk ingredients, Sugars (sugar, glucose, sweetened condensed milk), Wheat flour, Vegetable oils (coconut, palm, canola, palm kernel, soybean), Milk ingredients, Cocoa, Modified palm oil, Water, Mono- and diglycerides, Soy lecithin, Salt, Propylene glycol monostearate, Carrageenan, Cellulose gum, Carob bean gum, Baking soda, Potassium sorbate, Caramel colour, Annatto, Natural flavour. May contain: Peanuts, Tree nuts
